name: LDA
description: LDA is given a collection of documents as input data, via the featuresCol parameter. Each document is specified as a Vector of length vocabSize, where each entry is the count for the corresponding term (word) in the document

fields.name: featuresCol
fields.title: Features Column
fields.description: Features column of type vectorUDT for model fitting.

fields.name: k
fields.title: K
fields.description: The number of topics to create.

fields.name: optimizer
fields.title: Optimizer
fields.description: Optimizer or inference algorithm used to estimate the LDA model.

fields.name: topicDistributionCol
fields.title: TopicDistributionColumn
fields.description: Output column with estimates of the topic mixture distribution for each document

fields.name: checkpointInterval
fields.title: checkpointInterval
fields.description: The checkpoint interval (>= 1) or disable checkpoint (-1). E.g. 10 means that the cache will get checkpointed every 10 iterations.

fields.name: subsamplingRate
fields.title: subsamplingRate
fields.description: Fraction of the corpus to be sampled and used in each iteration of mini-batch gradient descent, in range (0, 1].
